players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be eliminated. Let's keep an eye on each other and try to uncover any hidden information."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie, let's all be vigilant and share any suspicious information we may have."
Charlie: "I think it's important that we all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it might seem. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
